alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Macon, southwestern Peach, southwestern Houston, south central Crawford and southeastern Taylor Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Nakomis, or 8 miles southwest of Fort Valley, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Valley, Marshallville, Reynolds, Saint Louis, Nakomis, Garden Valley, Winchester, Hicks, Henderson and Potterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
